definition: to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards

sentences.english: Man allegedly shocks stepdaughter with dog collar .
sentences.chinese: 继父用狗的电子项圈电击继女。

sentences.english: So my stepdaughter is now my stepmother.
sentences.chinese: 所以我的继女现在就是我的继母。
别忘了，我的继母又是我的继女。

sentences.english: Don’t forget that my stepmother is my stepdaughter.
sentences.chinese: 别忘了，我的继母又是我的继女。

sentences.english: Probyn said he had long lost hope that they would ever see his stepdaughter alive.
sentences.chinese: 他很久以前就对继女会活着回来失去了希望。

sentences.english: Henry was accused of abusing his stepdaughter.
sentences.chinese: 亨利被指控虐待他的继女。

sentences.english: The land owner is said to give hard measure to his step-daughter.
sentences.chinese: 听说那位地主对他的继女很苛刻。

sentences.english: 'I spoke to my stepdaughter on the phone from hospital and she didn't recognise who I was. She said I sounded Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 我在医院给我继女打电话，她根本听不出是我。

sentences.english: The woman was on trial for abusing her stepdaughter.
sentences.chinese: 那个女人因为虐待继女而受到审判。

sentences.english: On day one, i met her hot step-daughter .
sentences.chinese: 第一天，我遇到了她那性感火辣的继女。
